item.title: Book Club: Arguments and Results (James Noble)
item.description: We restarted our book club again last week by reading James Noble’s Arguments and Results paper, a paper I came across from a Michael Feathers blog post a few months ago detailing 10 papers that every programmer should read. We decided to try out the idea of reading papers/individual chapters from books as it allows us to vary the type of stuff we’re reading more frequently and is an approach which Obie seems to be having some success with.
